required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Epidural Catheter Thread Between Two Different Vendors
clinical_study.official_title: A Head-to-head Comparison of Catheter Thread Between Two Epidural Kit Vendors.

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of the study is to assess if there is a difference in ability to thread the epidural catheter from two different epidural pain management kits vendors

detailed_description.textblock: The aim of the study is to assess if there is a difference in ability to thread the epidural catheter from two different pain management kits. In order to improve patient care, if there is a difference in the time to thread epidurals with one kit over the other, we would like to use the kit with decreased time to thread in the future.

primary_outcome.measure: number of epidural catheter thread attempts

secondary_outcome.description: at the epidural placement, total amount of time required to establish successful epidural catheter thread

secondary_outcome.measure: the incidence of unintended dural punctures
secondary_outcome.description: after placement, yes or no question
after placement, yes or no question

secondary_outcome.measure: the incidence of epidural intravascular cannulations
secondary_outcome.description: after placement, yes or no question

secondary_outcome.measure: the number of epidural needle manipulations
secondary_outcome.description: at the epidural placement, number of times needles are adjusted

arm_group.description: Arrow FlexTip Plus Epidural Catheterization Kit is a single orifice flex tip catheter used to place epidurals in pregnant women in labor who request an epidural for pain management in labor. This kit will be used in half of the randomized weeks.

Perifix FX Springwound Epidural Catheter Kit is a multi-orifice flex tip catheter used to place epidurals in pregnant women in labor who request an epidural for pain management in labor. This kit will be used in half of the randomized weeks.

intervention.description: The group will be randomized to receive this labor analgesia kit.
The group will be randomized to receive this labor analgesia kit.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria: women in labor
-
Exclusion Criteria:
- none
